items.title: Stock Market LIVE Updates: GIFT Nifty suggests a weak start; US, Asian markets fall
items.description: Sensex Today | Stock Market LIVE Updates: Wall Street's main indexes closed lower on Friday, with the S&P 500 and Nasdaq notching their biggest one-day losses in two weeks, on concerns about slower interest-rate cuts and as investors reacted to cabinet picks by U.S. President-elect Donald Trump.

items.description: The consolidation may continue in the market, with a focus on the "sell on rally" strategy, considering the bearish sentiment. Below are some trading ideas for the near term.

items.title: Agri Picks Report November 18, 2024: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit, The government is considering lifting the suspension on futures trading of oil, oilseeds, and pulses, according to two senior government officials.

items.title: Live: How are markets poised to move this week? | Hero Moto, Glenmark in focus | Opening Bell
items.description: Frontline indices Sensex and Nifty ended second straight week with over 2 percent loss. This holiday-truncated week, Maharashtra election, FII flows, rising dollar and yields are likely to sway markets. With Nifty trading around its 200-DEMA level, experts see 23,800 as the next resistance, while support is placed around 23,400. This morning global cues are largely negative. US markets ended Friday on a negative note, while Asia-Pacific markets were largely lower. Among stocks in focus, watch out for Hero MotoCorp, City Gas stocks, and Glenmark Pharma. Catch Lovisha Darad in conversation with Sudeep Shah—Head of Technical & Derivative Research, SBI Securities and Raj Vyas, VP Research, Teji Mandi.

items.description: Dolat Capital Market is bullish on Muthoot Finance has recommended buy rating on the stock with a target price of Rs 2150 in its research report dated November 14, 2024.

items.description: In any diversified portfolio, there will be both winners and losers, and the consideration that should determine which you should sell, if any, is certainly not the price at which you bought it originally. - Daniel Kahneman

items.title: Hero MotoCorp shares surge 5% as brokerages retain 'Buy' call following Q2 results
items.description: Nomura raised its target price on Hero MotoCorp to Rs 5,805 citing strong Q2 results which also beat estimates. The brokerage highlighted Hero MotoCorp's strong rural demand during the festive season, boosted by a healthy monsoon.

items.title: Live: NTPC Green Energy’s `10,000 Cr IPO Opens On Nov 19| Management On Capex Plans| IPO Watch
items.description: The Rs 10,000 crore IPO of NTPC Green Energy Limited, the wholly owned subsidiary of the country's largest power generation company NTPC, opens for subscription on November 19. With a price band of Rs 102-108 per share, the public issue, which consists of an entirely fresh issue with no offer-for-sale component, will close on November 22. Institutional investors can participate in the anchor book of up to Rs 3,960 crore on November 18. Catch Nandita Khemka in conversation with the management on the company’s growth and expansion plans and how its plans to tackle competition.

items.title: Amber Enterprises |  Outlook is bright as it continuous to focus on diversifying the revenue mix
items.description: Amber continues to foray into new adjacent and ancillary businesses by leveraging core capabilities and competencies. Recent strategic partnerships and increasing demand traction in new ventures along with promising opportunities in railways and defence, should fuel earnings growth as well as business transformation over the next few years.
